com.amazon.speech.json

Class SpeechletRequestEnvelope<T extends SpeechletRequest>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazon.speech.json.SpeechletRequestEnvelope<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the specific type of request the envelope is for

    public class SpeechletRequestEnvelope<T extends SpeechletRequest>
extends Object
    Envelope to wrap the various parameters of a SpeechletV2 invocation.
    See Also:
    SpeechletV2, IntentRequest, Session, Context
